SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: UPDATE emailbccaccount SET EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@ <%=,EmailBccAccountCategoryID=@@EmailBccAccountCategoryID@@%><%=,EmailBccAccountCategoryName=@@EmailBccAccountCategoryName@@%><%=,EmailBccAccountAddress=@@EmailBccAccountAddress@@%><%=,EmailBccAccountName=@@EmailBccAccountName@@%><%=,EmailBccAccountCreateTime=@@EmailBccAccountCreateTime@@%><%=,EmailBccAccountLastTime=@@EmailBccAccountLastTime@@%><%=,EmailBccAccountIsDel=@@EmailBccAccountIsDel@@%> WHERE EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@;

SELECT eba.EmailBccAccountID,eba.EmailBccAccountCategoryID,eba.EmailBccAccountCategoryName,eba.EmailBccAccountAddress,eba.EmailBccAccountName,eba.EmailBccAccountCreateTime,eba.EmailBccAccountLastTime,eba.EmailBccAccountIsDel FROM emailbccaccount AS eba WHERE 1=1 <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountCategoryID=@@EmailBccAccountCategoryID@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountCategoryName=@@EmailBccAccountCategoryName@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountAddress=@@EmailBccAccountAddress@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountName=@@EmailBccAccountName@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountCreateTime=@@EmailBccAccountCreateTime@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountLastTime=@@EmailBccAccountLastTime@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountIsDel=@@EmailBccAccountIsDel@@%>;

SELECT eba.EmailBccAccountID,eba.EmailBccAccountCategoryID,eba.EmailBccAccountCategoryName,eba.EmailBccAccountAddress,eba.EmailBccAccountName,eba.EmailBccAccountCreateTime,eba.EmailBccAccountLastTime,eba.EmailBccAccountIsDel FROM emailbccaccount AS eba WHERE 1=1 <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountCategoryID=@@EmailBccAccountCategoryID@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountCategoryName=@@EmailBccAccountCategoryName@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountAddress=@@EmailBccAccountAddress@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountName=@@EmailBccAccountName@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountCreateTime=@@EmailBccAccountCreateTime@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountLastTime=@@EmailBccAccountLastTime@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountIsDel=@@EmailBccAccountIsDel@@%> LIMIT <R%= @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM emailbccaccount AS eba WHERE 1=1 <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountCategoryID=@@EmailBccAccountCategoryID@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountCategoryName=@@EmailBccAccountCategoryName@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountAddress=@@EmailBccAccountAddress@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountName=@@EmailBccAccountName@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountCreateTime=@@EmailBccAccountCreateTime@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountLastTime=@@EmailBccAccountLastTime@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountIsDel=@@EmailBccAccountIsDel@@%>;
